attributes.action: allow Her Majesty the Queen to resume her power to dismiss the Prime Minister if he/she is seen unfit by the Queen's subjects to continue in office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel, as do many, that the Head of State should, like other countries, have the power, or resume the power once vested in the Crown, to dismiss the Head of Government should a continuation of Opinion Polls suggest that the Electorate no longer have confidence in the Prime Minister.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
